subject: video camera artifact or television artifact?
author: teecee
full_text:
hi,

i have been experimenting recently with a video camera, aimed at the 
television, with the television on  a 'no signal' channel.

all you see is static/snow on it.

anyway, i had the vid camera running, and it has a zoom feature, so 
while it was recordng,i zoomed in and the result was a ton of color 
flashes, etc.

when i take the zoom off, it goes back to the static/snow...

again, is this the camera or tv?
